info.name: OFROO API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for OFROO Platform - Local Coupons & Offers System

## Features:
- Authentication & Authorization
- Offers & Categories Management
- Cart & Orders
- Financial System (Wallet, Transactions, Withdrawals)
- Advanced Reporting (PDF & Excel)
- Roles & Permissions (RBAC)
- Certificates & Courses
- Admin Control Panel

## Authentication:
1. Register/Login to get auth_token
2. Token is automatically saved after login
3. All protected endpoints use Bearer token

## Error Handling:
All API endpoints return JSON responses for errors:
- **401 Unauthorized**: Authentication required
- **403 Forbidden**: Insufficient permissions
- **404 Not Found**: Resource not found
- **405 Method Not Allowed**: Invalid HTTP method
- **422 Validation Error**: Invalid input data with detailed errors
- **500 Internal Server Error**: Server error with details (debug mode) or generic message (production)

All errors follow this format:
```json
{
  "message": "Error description",
  "error": "Additional error details"
}
```

## Base URL:
Update {{base_url}} variable for your environment
